Javascript Tip Calculator

It all started with the DailyUI challenge...

This design was originally created for the DailyUI challenge. I thought this would make a great Javascript practice project, so I decided to take my design to codepen and build a functioning prototype. I suppose my next step should be to build an app!

See the Pen JS Tip Calculator by Alyson Sherrard (@ux_unicorn) on CodePen.
